title: MSC Book Goes Live
text:
MSC Book Goes Live June 30, 2015 
MSC Cruisesâ€™ online booking engine for agents is now live. MSC Book allows agents to book cruises, save itineraries and search and compare cruise options by price range, destination, departure date or embarkation port. The tool also includes commission and accounting reports, as well as booking confirmations and e-tickets, which can be sent to clients. To celebrate the launch, MSC is giving agents a bonus 2% commission on all FIT bookings made through the booking tool until Dec. 31. Agents can register for MSC Book here . 0
